english_translation: What if you grab the branch and shake it?
Will flowers fill a branch without greenery?

kannada_original: ನೆಲಕೆ ಶ್ರಾವಣ ಬರದೆ ಹನಿ ಅರಸಿ ಸುಖವೇನು ?
english_transliteration: Nelake śrāvaṇa barade hani arasi sukhavēnu?
english_translation: What happiness is there seeking a drop of rain if Sharavana (rainy month) has not arrived on the ground?
Beauty is known when the season is pleased (or ripens) – Muddu Rāma.
